actions.name: Periodic Orbit

cost.trigger: The user's next activation after resolving Wish, Future Sight, or Doom Desire.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user's next activation after resolving Wish, Future Sight, or Doom Desire.
Effect: Connection - Doom Desire. The user freely resolves the attack once more. Periodic Orbit cannot be activated in response to another resolution resulting from a previous activation of Periodic Orbit.

system.description:
